name: ClickUp
description: Integrate with ClickUp to list, create, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Tasks
tools.description: List tasks in a ClickUp list. Filter by status, assignees, and due dates.

tools.name: Create Task
tools.description: Create a new task in a ClickUp list. Specify name, description, assignees, priority, and due date.

tools.name: Update Task
tools.description: Update an existing ClickUp task. Change name, status, priority, description, assignees, or due date.

tools.name: List Spaces
tools.description: List all spaces in a ClickUp team/workspace. Returns space names, IDs, and feature settings.

tools.name: List Lists
tools.description: List all lists within a ClickUp folder or space. Returns list names, IDs, and task counts.
